report.title: Survey samples list
report.description: A list of the parent samples (= a ferry crossing)
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id AND l.deleted=false JOIN surveys su ON su.id=s.survey_id AND s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples tr ON tr.parent_id=s.id AND tr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples pt ON pt.parent_id=tr.id AND pt.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=pt.id AND o.deleted=false #joins# WHERE s.deleted=false AND s.parent_id is null AND #website_filter#

param.name: survey_list
param.description: Comma separated list of survey IDs

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
